mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_SEQ ,A.MEMBER_NAME ,A.EMAIL ,A.REGISTERED_DT ,A.PHONE_NUMBER ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(LESSON_DAY) FROM LESSON WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = A.MEMBER_SEQ ) AS LESSON_DAY ,B.LESSON_START_DATE ,B.LESSON_END_DATE ,B.MONTH_OF_REGISTRATION FROM MEMBER2 A LEFT JOIN LESSON B ON(A.MEMBER_SEQ = B.MEMBER_SEQ) ORDER BY MEMBER_SEQ
